Spiritual Weapon Tips & Notes for BG3

Upcasting: For every 2 spell levels the weapon gains 8 Hit Points (20 HP base) and deals an additional +1d8 damage. In BG3, Spiritual Weapon is a summon that can be attacked and destroyed. Once summoned it has its own action economy and can be moved and attack without cost to the caster.

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic
